data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee To Hold Virtual Meeting
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) announced today that the Cannabis Advisory Committee will hold a virtual meeting on Wednesday, February 17, 2021. The agenda for the meeting can be found on to the Bureau’s website at the following link: https://bcc.ca.gov/about_us/meetings/agendas/20210217_cac.pdf To participate in the WebEx Events meeting on February 17, 2021, please […]
